testCases.label: Ensures that grocery list is empty on application start
testCases.description: Verifies that getAllGroceries() returns an empty list when the grocery table has just been created.

testCases.label: Adds one grocery item
testCases.description: Verifies that after adding 'apples' to the database, getAllGroceries() returns a list containing only 'apples'.

testCases.label: Adds one grocery item
testCases.description: Verifies that after adding 'bananas' to the database, getAllGroceries() returns a list containing only 'bananas'.
